questions.question: Bees play a crucial role in Timor-Leste's ecosystems and agriculture.

Using modern equipment and techniques to maximize honey production
Regularly treating bees with antibiotics to prevent diseases
Replacing queen bees every year to ensure high productivity
questions.answer: Minimal intervention and working with bees' natural behavior
